text: Ani sarvasrestha allahacya hukumavina konatahi jiva maru sakata nahi, tharaleli vela likhita ahe. Ya jagasi prema rakhanaryanna amhi thodese ya jagataca de'una takato ani akhiratace punya prapta karu icchinaryanna amhi tedekhila pradana karato ani abhara mananaryanna amhi lavakaraca cangala mobadala pradana karu
